DOC.brief_summary: El Valor de Nuestra Salud [ The Value Our Health ] 5-year study ( 2010-2014 ) involve grocery store San Diego County fund National Cancer Institute . The purpose study determine whether in-store program promote healthy food grocery store . Sixteen store San Diego County participate El Valor de Nuestra Salud . The store participate study randomly assign either intervention ( program evaluation ) control ( evaluation ) group . We test various strategy promote healthy food shopping among customer small-to-medium size Latino/Hispanic grocery store . These strategy include change store environment , food marketing effort , train sale associate . Our evaluation protocol determine whether project successful improve aspect store employee , well whether customer shop eat healthier food product . The primary aim study evaluate impact El Valor de Nuestra Salud intervention consumption fruit vegetable among store customer .
DOC.detailed_description: El Valor de Nuestra Salud [ The Value Our Health ] 5-year study ( 2010-2014 ) involve grocery store San Diego County fund National Cancer Institute . The purpose study determine whether in-store program promote healthy food grocery store . Sixteen store San Diego County participate El Valor de Nuestra Salud . The store participate study randomly assign either intervention ( program evaluation ) control ( evaluation ) group . We test various strategy promote healthy food shopping among customer small-to-medium size Latino/Hispanic grocery store . These strategy include change store environment , food marketing effort , train sale associate . Our evaluation protocol design determine whether project successful improve aspect store employee , well whether customer shop eat healthier food product . Customers recruit enter store participate project interview objective weight measure baseline , 6-months post-baseline , 12-months post-baseline . The primary aim study evaluate impact El Valor de Nuestra Salud intervention consumption fruit vegetable among store customer .
DOC.criteria: Must least 18 year age Must one main food shopper household Must shop study store least per week Must already purchaser food product store Must Latino Must speak Spanish and/or English Must able read Spanish Must eat 4 less cup fruit vegetable per day Must plan live San Diego County least next 12 month Must dietary restriction limit consumption fruit vegetable Participating customer shop study store wave month Participating customer shop intervention store previous wave month
